border--t-solid.title: Solid top border
border--t-solid.description: Gives the top border a solid line.

border--t-dashed.title: Dashed top border
border--t-dashed.description: Gives the top border a dashed line.

border--t-dotted.title: Dotted top border
border--t-dotted.description: Gives the top border a dotted line.

border--t-double.title: Double top border
border--t-double.description: Gives the top border a double line.

border--t-groove.title: Groove top border
border--t-groove.description: Gives the top border a groove.

border--t-ridge.title: Ridge top border
border--t-ridge.description: Gives the top border a ridge.

border--t-inset.title: Inset top border
border--t-inset.description: Gives the top border an inset.

border--t-outset.title: Outset top border
border--t-outset.description: Gives the top border an outset.
